import.disc: Artifacts can be added all at once from tools such as Genshin Optimizer, Adepti Scanner, etc. Please upload the .json file.

export.disc: Export current artifacts as a .json file. Useful for transferring data between devices or backing up data.

delete.disc: Delete all current artifacts. Can be used to replace artifacts with different data or to re-register artifacts from scratch.
delete.confirmDisc: Deleted data cannot be restored, so we recommend exporting and backing up your data before proceeding.
